articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Launch of Working Satellite
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Launch of Working Satellite
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry released the following statement Friday:
					The DPRK's preparations for launching Kwangmyongsong-3, an earth observation satellite, by its own efforts and with its indigenous technology have entered a full-fledged stage of action.
					
					The projected launch of the working satellite is a gift to be presented by the Korean people to the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung while entering the gate to a thriving nation and a work for implementing the behest of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					It has become a law-governed requirement of the age of latest science and technology and a worldwide trend to launch and use a working satellite urgently needed for the country's economic development.
					
					In order to prove the peaceful nature of a scientific and technological satellite launch in a transparent manner the DPRK invited experienced experts of space development institutions and media persons of the world to observe the course of the launch.
					
					The DPRK's launch of the working satellite is an exercise of an independent and legitimate right pursuant to universally accepted international laws on peaceful use of space including the Space Treaty which reflects the general will of the international community which stands above the UNSC resolution.
					
					If the DPRK is not allowed to launch a satellite because such technology of ballistic missile as that of long-range missile is used, it will be deprived of the right to satellite launch for good. It is intolerable double standards for some countries to assert that the DPRK only is not allowed to launch satellites while they are launching them as commonplace events.
					
					They should not make an excessive reaction to the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes from their viewpoint of confrontation but fairly and calmly accept it as it is. This will amount to proving in practice their commitment that they have no hostile will toward the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK's satellite launch is an issue quite different from the February 29 DPRK-U.S. agreement. The DPRK had already consistently clarified at the three rounds of the DPRK-U.S. high-level talks that the satellite launch is not included in the long-range missile launch.
					
					The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to sincerely implement the DPRK-U.S. agreement. We have already invited a delegation of the International Atomic Energy Agency to discuss the procedures to verify the moratorium on uranium enrichment activities and are coming to sincere understanding for implementing the agreement with the U.S. side.
					
					For the U.S. to find fault with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes is laying hurdles in the way of implementing the agreement as it is contrary to the September 19 joint statement and the spirit of respect for sovereignty and equality of the DPRK-U.S. agreement based on it.
					
					If there will be any sinister attempt to deprive the DPRK of its independent and legitimate right and put the unreasonable double standards upon it, this will inevitably compel the DPRK to take counter-measures. The DPRK does not wish to see the repetition of vicious cycle of such confrontation and escalated tension.
					
					It is the expectation of the DPRK that its sincere efforts to ensure peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and realize its denuclearization through dialogue and negotiations will get due response from the parties concerned.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Offices of the World Food Programme and UNICEF in Pyongyang laid floral baskets before the equestrian statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio on Friday on the occasion of the 100th day of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute in humblest reverence to the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Plot to Turn Seoul "Nuclear Security Summit" into Platform for Int'l Anti-DPRK Campaign under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Accused of Trying to Use Seoul "Summit" for Int'l Anti-DPRK Campaign
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement Friday denounced the south Korean regime for working hard to turn the Seoul "nuclear security summit" into a platform for international smear campaign against the DPRK.
					By nature, the summit was first hosted by the U.S. in Washington in 2010 under the pretext of "preventing nuclear terrorism" and, therefore, there is no ground whatsoever to pull up the DPRK, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					At the outset the south Korean puppet regime tried hard to dodge the DPRK's opposition and domestic and foreign public criticism, asserting that the summit is not a forum for discussing the "nuclear issue of the north." 
					
					The regime, however, revealed its sinister intention to turn the summit into a forum for such noisy anti-DPRK campaign as taking issue with its nuclear deterrent and projected launch of Kwangmyongsong-3 for peaceful purposes. 
					
					Lurking behind this are the regime's sinister aims to weather serious ruling crisis by rallying conservative forces through more frantic rackets of confrontation and war in the closing period of its rule and turn its unfavorable situation in the general election favorable to it. It also aims to make workable earlier UN resolutions on sanctions against the DPRK now defunct in face of domestic and foreign criticism and kick off a new racket for sanctions.
					
					And the regime's frantic racket was prompted by its uneasiness and fear of the DPRK's demonstration of tremendous national power before the world. Another ulterior aim is to save its face as it failed twice to launch a satellite with the help of others.
					
					To use an international meeting for moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen is a reckless act which can be perpetrated only by such ignorant political gangsters and hooligans as the puppet group.
					
					The DPRK's stand on the summit has already been clarified.
					
					If the puppet group dares find fault with the DPRK's nuclear deterrent and satellite launch for peaceful purposes and kick off an anti-DPRK racket at the summit despite its repeated warnings and accusations at home and abroad, this will compel it to take strongest counter-measures which no one can imagine.
					
					We will never give up what has already been declared but react to any pressure or provocation with toughest measures.
					
					In case an extreme development takes place on the Korean Peninsula, the provocateurs and their followers will be entirely accountable for it.

articles.title: Korean People Display Their Will to Hold Kim Jong Il in High Esteem Forever
articles.content:
Korean People Display Their Will to Hold Kim Jong Il in High Esteem Forever
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The 100th day is coming near after the sudden demise of leader Kim Jong Il on Dec. 17, 2011.
					In this period the servicepersons and people of the DPRK have hardened their will to perpetuate the memory of the leader, sorely missing him.
					
					When a decree and a decision on conferring the title of DPRK Hero and the title of Generalissimo on him were issued, they expressed regret at the failure to present such honor in his lifetime, with tears in their eyes.
					
					On January 12 the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea made public, reflecting their unanimous desire and ardent request, a special report that Kim Jong Il would be laid in state at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche, and his statue would be erected. The report also said that his birthday (Feb. 16) would be instituted as the Day of the Shining Star and his smiling portraits and towers to his immortality built across the country.
					
					The period is, in fact, the days when the Korean army and people's intense loyalty to leader Kim Jong Il and their will to hold him in high esteem forever were fully displayed.
					
					They are now working harder to build a thriving country and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to his behests.

articles.title: Overseas Korean Mourners' Delegations Here
articles.content:
Overseas Korean Mourners' Delegations Here
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Overseas Korean mourners' delegations arrived here on Friday to attend the memorial service on the 100th day after the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					They are delegations of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia led by Vice-Chairperson Ri Chae Son.

articles.title: Pyongyang Folk Park Close to Completion
articles.content:
Pyongyang Folk Park Close to Completion
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The day of the completion of the Pyongyang Folk Park is drawing closer as the days go by.
					Soldier-builders are pushing ahead with the construction of more than 690 structures in at least 270 projects at a final phase.
					
					The work for leveling the area and afforestation and greening have been carried out in a three-dimensional way to plant at least 200 000 trees in at least 90 hectares.
					
					The project for the modern district has been nearing completion to go over to a detailed work. The projects to make models of various historic sites and mementoes in the district of historic relics have been carried out 98 percent on all indices on an average.
					
					Daily quotas for inside and outside plastering, roofing and painting of the palace in Palhae Dynasty, government office in Koguryo Dynasty, etc. are now being carried out at 200 percent in the sites for the construction of folk villages where at least 200 buildings are springing up in more than 60 projects. 
					
					Outside plastering of the gates is progressing at a final phase in the education ground covering 2 600 square meters and construction site of the general history education district which includes the general visual board for history education, the monument to the construction of the park, etc.
					
					25 projects for the construction of the folk game district are also nearing completion in the main.

articles.title: DPRK Encourages Foreign Investment
articles.content:
DPRK Encourages Foreign Investment
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is willing to further improve its environment for foreign investment, Yun Yong Sok, a vice department director of the DPRK Committee for Investment and Joint Venture, told KCNA.
					He said:
					
					The nation's economy is gaining momentum, with many industrial establishments and power stations being built across the country.
					
					It is a consistent policy of the DPRK Government to enhance economic cooperation with other countries, while beefing up its self-reliant national economy.
					
					In December last year, the government amended investment-related laws, including the DPRK Law and Regulations on Foreign Investment, laws on joint venture and joint collaboration and the Law on Foreign-funded Businesses and Foreigners' Tax Payment, in step with the nation's developing economy and international practices.
					
					It enacted the law on economic zone on Hwanggumphyong and Wihwa islets in the River Amnok and revised and supplemented the law on the Rason economic and trade zone.
					
					The joint development and management in the two economic zones takes on a new way of cooperation. Now it has been under way in a creditable way, driven by the active efforts of both sides of the DPRK and China.
					
					Contracts on joint venture and joint collaboration have been on increase with the investment environment changing for the better. 
					
					Rare earth abundant in the country and infrastructure projects lure foreign investment in the DPRK.
					
					The committee will pay deep attention to ensuring the interests of foreign investors, while invigorating the exchange and cooperation with governments, investors and businesses.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth
Korean People's Cheers for Kim Il Sung's Triumphant Return
					
					Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- It was 60 odd years ago that President Kim Il Sung triumphantly returned to Pyongyang after liberating Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule of 40 odd years. 
					
					All the Korean people warmly welcomed him as liberator of the country and sun of the nation, shouting "Long live General Kim Il Sung".
					
					The Korean people had made every possible effort for the independence of the country. They waged a campaign to pay back national debts and some of them launched the volunteers' struggle against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					But, nobody, except Kim Il Sung, achieved the liberation of the country.
					
					In April Juche 21 (1932) he founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and declared a war with the Japanese imperialists. Since then he had gained fame as a legendary hero in the battles with the one million-strong Japanese Kwantung Army.
					
					In those days he droved the Japanese army into a tight corner with his protean tactics, encouraged the KPRA members, singing militant and appealing songs composed by himself and stood in the van of charges to break through the enemy siege.
					
					The anti-Japanese armed struggle, commanded by him, ended in victory on August 15, 1945 when the Japanese imperialists surrendered at discretion by KPRA's powerful attacks and people's armed resistance.
					
					The great victory in the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle was that of the immortal Juche idea, the unique Songun (military-first) idea created by Kim Il Sung.
					
					On October 14 that year a mass rally took place at Moranbong public playground (now Kim Il Sung Stadium) in welcome of his triumphant return.
					
					Pyongyang Minbo, a newspaper at that time, wrote about the rally:
					
					"Pyongyang has a 4 000-year-long history and a large population of 400 000. Has it ever had such a large meeting as this and such an important meeting? …
					
					What gave historic significance to this meeting and turned it into a storm of emotion, was that General Kim Il Sung, a great patriot of Korea and a hero whom Pyongyang produced, was present in person there, and extended joyful and warm greetings and words of encouragement to the people. … as soon as General Kim Il Sung appeared on the platform, the hero who the Korean people hold in high respect and have been looking forward to seeing, a storm of enthusiastic cheers arose, and most of the participants were deeply moved to silent tear."
					
					Recalling that day, Kim Il Sung wrote in his reminiscences "With the Century":
					
					"If anyone asked me about the happiest moment in my life, I would reply that it was that moment. It was happiness emanating from the pride that I had fought for the people as a son of the people, from the feeling that the people loved and trusted me and from the fact that I was in the embrace of the people."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Conservative Group to Stop Nuclear Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Regime to Stop Nuclear Racket against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative authorities should immediately stop the anti-DPRK nuclear racket and their moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK with "the nuclear security summit" as an occasion, urges Rodong Sinmun on Friday in a bylined article.
					One of the main purposes of the world summit the south Korean authorities are going to host under the pretext of "nuclear security" is to escalate the anti-DPRK nuclear racket and the moves for a war against the DPRK, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The south Korean conservative group is working hard to use this summit as an opportunity of convincing the people in and outside south Korea of "nuclear threat from the north" in a bid to justify and intensify its moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK. The anti-DPRK burlesque projected by the puppet forces on the world's biggest nuclear arsenal, while frantically staging saber-rattling for a nuclear war, will only further increase the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The puppet war-like forces are now crying out for high alert, claiming that someone's "provocation" and "infiltration" are expected. This suggests that they may fabricate any shocking incident to shift its responsibility for it onto the DPRK and go over to igniting a war against the DPRK in case anti-"government" actions mount in south Korea and the political situation concerning "the National Assembly election" steadily turns unfavorable to them.
					
					The anti-DPRK smear campaign of the south Korean conservative group should be held in check not only for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula but for global peace and security. It is illogical to hold the nuclear security summit in south Korea, a nuclear outpost of the U.S. and the world's biggest nuclear arsenal.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Myung Bak of Using Nuclear Security Summit for Anti-DPRK Confrontation
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Accused of Using Nuclear Security Summit for Anti-DPRK Confrontation
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak recently blustered the "nuclear security summit would play an important role in garnering support of the international community for the denuclearization of the north", talking rubbish that "south Korea is not free from the threat of nuclear terrorism as it faces the north".
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					Lee's remarks brought to light his plot to use the Seoul "summit" as a platform for international cooperation for an anti-DPRK nuclear racket by bringing the "north's nuclear issue" up for discussion at the "summit."
					
					The south Korean people's constant horror and uneasiness about a nuclear war were caused by the Lee Myung Bak regime's row for the confrontation between the north and the south and its moves to provoke a war against the north. 
					
					The south Korean puppet forces had already worked out a dangerous scenario to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK in collusion with the United States. No one can tell when this will be put into practice. This is precisely a threat of nuclear terrorism.
					
					Moreover, the "nuclear security summit" is a forum for discussing the security of nuclear substance and facilities. The "nuclear issue of the north" raised by the puppet forces is not on the agenda of the "summit," much less being an issue to be discussed.
					
					The outbursts let loose by the traitor clearly indicate that his barometer of "nuclear security" is not peace and security of the world but a wild ambition to escalate the confrontation.
					
					There is terminology about the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, not the "denuclearization of the north."
					
					Moreover, the nuclear issue of the peninsula has nothing to do with the issue of nuclear security as it is set to be settled through the six-party talks.
					
					Lee Myung Bak would be well advised to stop talking nonsense that only invites derision and denunciation at home and abroad.

articles.title: Pomminryon Calls on All Koreans to Frustrate War Moves of S. Korean Authorities
articles.content:
Pomminryon Calls on All Koreans to Frustrate War Moves of S. Korean Authorities
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The north and south and overseas headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) Friday made public the following joint statement:
					Today Korea has been exposed to the danger of war in which the peace of the country and the destiny of the nation have been seriously threatened. 
					
					The south Korean military warmongers are staging joint military exercises for aggression after introducing huge armed forces from outsiders despite unanimous denunciation of the Koreans. 
					
					At the same time, they have been engrossed in all kinds of anti-DPRK psychological campaign and military provocations that rattle the nerve of the fellow countrymen in the areas along the heavily armed Military Demarcation Line at a time when an accidental gun report may lead to an all-out war. 
					
					This is a dangerous warlike action aimed to screw up the military tension between the north and the south and ignite a war at any cost in this land. 
					
					The north and south and overseas headquarters of Pomminryon strongly condemn in the name of all Koreans the war-confrontation moves of the conservative authorities of south Korea as a blatant challenge to the aspiration and wishes of all Koreans for peace and independent reunification of the country, and a reckless provocation to light the fuse of war against the north by escalating the tension to the extremes. 
					
					We cannot remain an onlooker to two-month-odd long war drills the warmongers are staging in the sky, land and seas of south Korea with the mobilization of troops and latest war equipment huge enough to fight a war. 
					
					The south side authorities seek to give rise to a military clash between the north and the south during the war drills and start an actual war under that pretext. They are now trying to find a way out of their worst ruling crisis, caused by their sycophancy toward the U.S., confrontation with fellow countrymen and unpopular rule, in provoking a war.
					
					A war is becoming more feasible. 
					
					Unless all Koreans clear off the heavy clouds of war hanging over the land of Korea by their own efforts, the Korean nation will suffer horrible nuclear holocaust more disastrous than that in the 1950s.
					
					Pomminryon will turn out in the just struggle to resolutely frustrate the war-confrontation moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and firmly defend peace of the country and security of the nation, under the banner of June 15 joint declaration and banner of peace against war. 
					
					For the present, it will decisively check the reckless war exercises south Korea is staging with outside forces defying the unanimous denunciation of all Koreans, and launch massive struggle to curb all hostile acts that may escalate military tension and bring a war. 
					
					Pomminryon strongly calls upon all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to set March and April as "period of movement for defending peace against war" and launch joint actions and solidarity activities to resolutely frustrate the war and confrontation moves of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad. 
					
					We firmly believe that all the political parties, organizations and people in the north and the south and overseas desirous of the peace and independent reunification of the country will extend full support and solidarity to the patriotic call of Pomminryon.

articles.title: "Yusin" Dictator Park Chung-hee's Crimes Exposed
articles.content:
"Yusin" Dictator Park Chung-hee's Crimes Exposed
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute Friday issued an investigative report on Park Chung-hee's "Yusin" dictatorship as the conservative group in south Korea has become undisguised in its moves to revive the "Yusin" dictatorship. 
					The report said:
					
					Park Chung-hee was a top-class pro-Japanese traitor who was raised as a die-hard "Japanese subject" since he went to the elementary school and teacher training school during the period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea. 
					
					Entering the Manchuria Military Academy, he presented to the Japanese imperialists a blood-written pledge and letter which read "Park Chung-hee will be loyal with death" and "I pledge to render devoted service to Japan as its citizen and remain loyal as a dog and a horse", astonishing even Japanese. At the time of graduation, he received the title "The best solider of the Japanese Empire" together with Japanese name Mashao Takaki and a gold watch from the puppet Manchukuo emperor.
					
					After his admission to the Japanese Military Academy, he changed his name into Minoru Okamodo. After graduation, he served a Japanese Kwangtung army and the puppet Manchukuo army during which he took part in more than 110 punitive operations and killed a number of patriots who fought for independence.
					
					Park Chung-hee staged the May 16 military coup. Resolved to become the second Ri Wan Yong, he signed the south Korea-Japan "agreement" which nullified the reparation for the Japanese imperialists' 41-year colonial rule in return for the 300 million U.S. dollars worth "aid" and the 200 million U.S. dollars worth "loan" (financial loan).
					
					Park Chung-hee was also a top-class pro-U.S. element.
					
					When the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean War in June 1950, he brutally killed patriotic people in the front and the rear, while working at the Intelligence Department of the puppet Army headquarters. 
					
					During his office as president, he went to his U.S. masters Kennedy, Johnson, Nixon, Ford, Carter and all others upon their inauguration and behaved in a shameful manner. He offered south Korea to the U.S. as its colony just as he promised to his master.
					
					Park Chung-hee was a matchless fascist dictator.
					
					Since he seized power through the May 16 military coup, he enforced harsh "military rule" for two years and seven months.
					
					In 1963 he changed his military uniform into civilian clothes and put on the presidential helmet, saying that the "military rule is replaced by civilian rule".
					
					The traitor revised the constitution to make the "presidential responsibility system", taking all powers in his hands. He staffed Chongwadae, the administration and the ruling party with military gangsters. He also posted military hooligans to offices in the central intelligence service, police, overseas diplomatic missions as well as government-run enterprises, sub-county heads and village headmen, in a bid to consolidate the military dictatorship system.
					
					Park Chung-hee's dictatorial system culminated in the "Yusin" system fabricated in October 1972.
					
					He took such government official posts as "president", chairman of the "Council of State", chairman of the "security council" and chairman of the "people's council for unification" and seized unlimited rights to control all power means.
					
					He even set up the "lifelong presidential system".
					
					The crackdown on the people had gone beyond imagination under "Yusin" dictatorship.
					
					He covered the whole of south Korea with tight surveillance networks with the involvement of 700 000-strong puppet army, more than 15 000 agents of the "Central Intelligence Service", over 370 000 political special agents, more than 50 000-strong police, over 320 000 police information agents and 3 million-strong homeland defence reserve forces.
					
					Put into force at a moment's notice were emergency martial law, garrison order, state of emergency and emergency step and common occurrence were political vacation, political temporary cessation of study, month of counter-espionage, campaign of finding out seditious persons and campaign for eradicating betrayers to "Yusin" unprecedented in history.
					
					All harsh methods were used in the secret torture rooms of the Central Intelligence Service including water-boarding, ordeal by fire, electric shock torture, narcotics torture, snake torture, glow lamp torture, aeroplane torture, Chinggis Khan cooking torture and bamboo needle torture.
					
					Park Chung-hee was a heinous confrontation-minded maniac who stood against the country's reunification.
					
					During his office, he tried to make the division of the country permanent while fanning up the north-south confrontation. 
					
					He worked hard to put the policy of "two Koreas" into practice and made desperate efforts to make preparations for a war against the north and provoke it, backed by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					Owing to the traitor's anti-communist acts, the north-south relations were deteriorated, the country remained divided and the south Korean people's hope for reunification was dashed.
					
					Park was the chieftain of chronically reeling economy being dependent on other countries.
					
					He made sure that it was provided for by law and policy to cut down  taxes levied on foreign capitalists and let the "government" make up for their loss and to provide them the patent right, as well as to ensure the authorities' suppression of those hired by foreign enterprises if they form trade unions or cause labor troubles.
					
					Due to the traitor's indiscriminate introduction of foreign capital, the foreign debt of the south Korean economy totaled 25 billion U.S. dollars in late 1979, 227 times increase from 1960. This accounted for 14.3 percent of the debts of the developing countries at that time.
					
					The traitor turned the south Korean economy into the big business economy ruled by a tiny handful of big businesses and plagued by all sorts of corruption and irregularities.
					
					The wide gap between the rich and the poor of the south Korean society is due to the traitor's unpopular policy.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, echoing the Park Chung-hee-style economic development, pushed the south Korean economy into bankruptcy while talking about "economic recovery". This speaks volumes for the unjust jackboot dictatorship of Park.
					
					Shuddering, indeed, are the crimes committed by Park during the 18-year period of rule.
					
					It is intolerable disgrace on the nation that thrice-cursed traitor Park is being eulogized, the report said, warning that the remnants of "Yusin" seeking to call back the departed spirit of dictatorship are bound to meet ruin, sternly judged by history and the nation.

articles.title: South Koreans Miss Father of Nation
articles.content:
South Koreans Miss Father of Nation
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), mentioned the popular feelings in south Korea missing leader Kim Jong Il very much, when interviewed by KCNA on Friday.
					Boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il is expressed by people in different parts of south Korea, he said, and went on:
					
					Nearly 100 days have passed since the untimely demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il.
					
					Those days spent in bitter sorrow and grief made the Korean nation keenly realize what great man it held in high esteem as the leader for reunification.
					
					The vanguard fighters of the AINDF and the patriotic people are looking back with deep emotion on the whole life of Kim Jong Il and praying for his immortality in humblest reverence.
					
					Posted on the internet websites are such articles as "We pray for the soul of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" and "The noble soul of the chairman of the National Defence Commission, the sun of the nation, will always be cherished in the hearts of the people", deeply touching the people.
					
					Book "Collection of legends about Mt. Paektu", collection of poems "Care of Mt. Paektu" and song "Song in praise of Mt. Paektu" and others which lead readers to boundless reverence are widely published and disseminated to add to people's enthusiasm for praising the great man.
					
					Voices calling for taking part in the 100th day memorial service are heard from among people in different parts of south Korea including Seoul, Taegu and Pusan in whose veins runs the blood of the nation and who respect human ethics and morality and the beautiful manners and customs handed by ancestors.
					
					It is the inevitability of history that the popular mind-set in south Korea is focusing on Kim Jong Il.
					
					The unbounded reverence for Kim Jong Il finds its more vivid manifestation in the south Korean people's ardent worship for the dear respected Kim Jong Un, he noted, stressing that reunification is sure to be achieved thanks to his leadership.

articles.title: Lee Group Accused of Stepping up Construction of Naval Base on Jeju Island
articles.content:
Lee Group Accused of Stepping up Construction of Naval Base on Jeju Island
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the Measure Council for Checking the Construction of the Jeju Naval Base in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on March 20 at which they condemned the group of traitors for frantically stepping up the construction of the naval base.
					They accused the military authorities of pushing forward the construction project, seriously polluting the natural environment of Kangjong Village on Jeju Island.
					
					Recalling that people of different social strata are conducting positive activities in solidarity with residents of Jeju Island and peace champions in their just and courageous actions, they called for an intensified campaign against the above-said construction project. 
					
					People will punish the Lee Myung Bak regime without fail for its misdoings, they warned. 
					
					At the end of the conference, they handed a written protest demanding a halt to the construction to Chongwadae.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Its Plot to Stage Confrontation Farces
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Its Plot to Stage Confrontation Farces
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a statement on March 20 denouncing the plot of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to stage new confrontation farces.
					At a time when the danger of war is increasing as the days go by the Lee Myung Bak "government" set March 26 when the Cheonan ship sank as the "day of punishment" and is contemplating staging confrontation farces such as anti-DPRK events and special spiritual education, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					Moreover, it is leaving no means to deepen the crisis as exemplified by its plan to stage large-scale joint military exercises with the U.S. on the islands in the West Sea of Korea and waters around them on the occasion of the day.
					
					Prevailing on this land is such a dangerous situation that any trifling accidental incident can lead to a war in a minute. But the Lee Myung Bak group is persisting in its madcap confrontation racket.
					
					This is aimed at escaping the people's judgment in the forthcoming general election, the statement noted, urging the authorities to cancel all provocative plans, though belatedly.
					
					The statement warned that in case the reckless confrontation racket leads to a war, the authorities will be held fully accountable for the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: S. Korean Politicians Demand Probe into Truth about Illegal Investigation into Civilians
articles.content:
S. Korean Politicians Demand Probe into Truth about Illegal Investigation into Civilians
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The floor leader and executive chairman of the Democratic United Party (DUP) of south Korea Wednesday demanded Lee Myung Bak probe the truth about the case of the illegal investigation into civilians.
					They queried who believes that Ri Yong Ho, former secretary for employment and labor-management of Chongwadae, arbitrarily exercised his authority over the illegal acts of the room for supporting ethics of public officials unrelated to his duty.
					
					They noted that such important matters as concealing information about the illegal investigation into civilians cannot but be reported to the executive chief, asserting that now is the time for Lee Myung Bak to clarify everything.
					
					They stressed that Lee Myung Bak should directly disclose the truth about the case and make an apology before the people.

articles.title: Wage Hike Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Wage Hike Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Those Receiving the Minimum Wages grouping more than 30 civic and social organizations including the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday demanding a solution to the issue of wages threatening the civilians' right to existence.
					Speakers at the press conference noted every worker is now paid money less than the cost for his or her single meal though they toiled and moiled all day long. With this wage workers can hardly eke out their living, they deplored, and continued:
					
					The business groups, however, get richer whereas people get poorer under the Lee Myung Bak "government". 
					
					They called for punishing the present regime and the ruling party in the upcoming general election by concerted efforts in order to have the wage issue of the workers settled.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Switzerland, Bulgaria
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Switzerland, Bulgaria
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits took place in Switzerland and Bulgaria on March 10 and 15 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Present there on invitation were officials and people of the countries and staff members of DPRK embassies.
					
					Speakers including the chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee spoke highly of Kim Il Sung as a great leader who devoted his all to the country's freedom and independence, people's happiness and the bright future of mankind.
					
					They referred to the facts that leader Kim Jong Il made ceaseless long journeys of field guidance for the country's prosperity and people's happiness and turned the DPRK into an invincible military power which no formidable enemy dares provoke, by pursuing original Songun politics.
					
					Saying that the dynamic leadership provided by the dear respected Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is winning the admiration of the world, they wished the Korean people great successes in their struggle to defend socialism, build a thriving nation and achieve national reunification, united close around him.
					
					A reporter and speakers including the president of the Central Council of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union said the founding of the Juche idea marked a historic event as it ushered in a new era of independence in which the popular masses are emerging masters of their own destiny and history.
					
					A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet Homepage of Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet Homepage of Peruvian Organization
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" on its Internet homepage on March 18.
					The work, published on January 29, 2003, clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution.
					
					It also deals with the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Mexican Newspaper Praises Kim Jong Il as Elder Statesman
articles.content:
Mexican Newspaper Praises Kim Jong Il as Elder Statesman
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Mexican newspaper Unidad Nacional on March 15 dedicated one whole page to the article titled "Elder statesman" illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					Recalling that Kim Jong Il had a more than half a century-long political career, the paper referred to the fact that his brilliant history of revolutionary leadership started since he began his Songun revolutionary leadership in August of 1960.
					
					The paper continued:
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il had pursued the most successful policies.
					
					He had led the Korean people for more than half a century, successfully pursing his policies, without even a single failure, frustration and deviation. This would have been unthinkable without his political philosophy. 
					
					His political philosophy is the Juche idea recognized by the international community as a guiding idea for the cause of independence.
					
					Holding aloft the banner of Songun, he formulated the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism despite the turmoil at the end of the 20th century in which the imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices were rampant.
					
					It was thanks to the Songun politics that the country's military capability was bolstered in every way, making it possible to prevent a war in the Korean Peninsula, a big hotspot, and ensure peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of our planet.

articles.title: Russia, Mexico Support DPRK's Measures
articles.content:
Russia, Mexico Support DPRK's Measures
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Soviet Union and the International Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party" released a joint statement on March 13, denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills. 
					Due to the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime, the situation on the Korean Peninsula has again reached the brink of war, the statement said, and went on:
					
					Regretfully, the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are oblivious of the lesson taught by their heavy defeat in the Korean War in the 1950s.
					
					The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrent is to cope with the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' acts of aggression. 
					
					The Korean people are struggling to reliably safeguard the country and build a thriving socialist nation and achieve independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					It is the ulterior intention of the Lee Myung Bak regime to hamstring their efforts.
					
					The Communist Party of Soviet Union and the International Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party" vehemently condemn the moves of the U.S. warmongers to provoke a war and the Lee Myung Bak puppet forces' undisguised acts of treachery. We support all the measures taken by the DPRK to protect the dignity of its supreme leadership and voice solidarity with it.
					
					On the same day 9 political parties and organizations including the People's Socialist Party, the Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification of Mexico made public a joint statement expressing support and solidarity with all the service personnel and people of the DPRK in their firm stand.
					
					The statement called upon the political parties, governments and organizations of all countries in the world to send support and encouragement to the party, army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Newspapers of France Introduce Unhasu Orchestra as Promising Orchestra
articles.content:
Newspapers of France Introduce Unhasu Orchestra as Promising
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- French newspapers carried articles introducing the successful performance given by the Unhasu Orchestra of the DPRK in Paris.
					The March 15th issue of Figaro said: The Unhasu Orchestra of the DPRK is a promising orchestra and its musicians have high skills though they are in their 20s.
					
					The concert master's violin solo was highly acclaimed by the audience for his skills and graceful melody.
					
					The orchestral music "Arirang" jointly played by the DPRK Unhasu Orchestra and the Radio Philharmonic Orchestra of France deeply impressed the audience.
					
					The March 16th issue of Monde said: Most of the members of the DPRK Unhasu Orchestra are talented instrumentalists in their 20s and it is recognized as a promising orchestra with high skills.
					
					The orchestra successfully played not only Korean music but foreign music.
					
					The duet of kayagum and haegum, Korean traditional musical instruments, in particular, deeply impressed French audience.
					
					In the Part 2 of the concert instrumentalists of the DPRK and France successfully played the orchestra music "Brams Concertos," winning applause from the audience.

articles.title: Russian FM Denounces U.S. Wrong Attempt to Build Military Bases in Afghanistan
articles.content:
Russian FM Denounces U.S. Wrong Attempt to Build Military Bases in Afghanistan
Moscow, March 22 (KCNA) -- Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov at a recent interview with a TV broadcasting service slammed the U.S. wrong attempt to build military bases in Afghanistan.
					He termed odd the U.S. government's attitude of having a purposeful consultation with the Afghan counterpart over the issue of setting up 4 or 5 military bases in Afghanistan after the withdrawal of U.S. and NATO forces in 2014.
					
					It is illogical for the U.S. to assert that it would keep military bases even after the withdrawal, he noted, adding the territory of Afghanistan should not be used for establishing different military facilities to cause the concern of the third country.

articles.title: Importing Oil from Iran Is Legitimate: Spokesman for Chinese Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Importing Oil from Iran Is Legitimate: Spokesman for Chinese Foreign Ministry
Beijing, March 22 (KCNA) -- Hong Lei, spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of China, in a press conference on March 21 said that it is legitimate for China to import oil from Iran.
					It is legitimate for China to import oil from Iran through regular routes as required by its own economic development. And it does not conflict with the relevant UNSC resolution and does not harm the interests of the third party and international community, he said.
					
					China is consistently opposed to a country inflicting sanctions on the other country according to its home law and putting unilateral sanctions on the third country, in particular, he said.

articles.title: Iranian President Deplores "Blind Support" from U.S. and West for Israel
articles.content:
Iranian President Deplores "Blind Support" from U.S. and West for Israel
Tehran, March 22 (KCNA) -- President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad in a recent diplomatic conference bitterly censured the U.S. and the West for shielding Israel.
					The U.S. and Europe spend tens of billions of dollars each year in Zionists to help a criminal regime to continue its occupation of Palestinian territories of the West Bank and Jerusalem, he deplored.
					
					Saying the existence of the Zionist regime is an insult to freedom, justice and to all the independent nations, he reiterated his call upon the international community to show greater sensitivity to the tragedy of the people that suffers the Israeli occupation.

articles.title: Iranian Leader Calls for Accelerating Economic Development
articles.content:
Iranian Leader Calls for Accelerating Economic Development
Tehran, March 22 (KCNA) -- Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, called upon all the people to accelerate economic development on March 20.
					Referring to the achievements made by the Iranian people last year, he said the important task for the economic development this year is to increase domestic production.
					
					It is possible to overcome the sanctions by enemies and bring better national economy only when the production is activated, he added, affirming that Iran would foil all sorts of enemies' challenges through the people's positive efforts for economic development and the government's proper program.

articles.title: Iranian Majlis Expresses Uncompromising Attitude towards Nuclear Program
articles.content:
Iranian Majlis Urges U.S. and West to Roll back Their Confrontation Policies
Tehran, March 22 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the National Security and Foreign Policy Committee of Iranian Majlis, when interviewed by a news agency on March 18, urged the U.S. and the West to roll back their confrontation policies.
					Referring to the fact that Iran's scientists succeeded in the production of nuclear fuel rods, he said Iran possesses sufficient nuclear technology, warning if the U.S. and the West refuse to accept this reality, they will suffer only a huge loss.
					
					Iran will make no compromise over its nuclear program, he stressed. He held that the U.S. and the West should pay respect for Iran's level of nuclear technology and take an option of cooperation rather than pursuing a confrontation policy.

articles.title: Bolivia Demands Cuba's Presence in Summit of Americas
articles.content:
Bolivia Demands Cuba's Presence in Summit of Americas
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Bolivia reiterated Tuesday that a Summit of the Americas without Cuba is not a true regional summit, after exclusion of the Caribbean island from that forum under U.S. pressure.
					In statements to Prensa Latina, Deputy Foreign Minister of Bolivia Juan Carlos Alurralde reaffirmed his country's position regarding the absence of Cuba from the so-called Summit of the Americas. Cuba has to be present, must be part of the family living in this continent, said Alurralde.
					
					The countries of the Bolivarian Alliance for the Peoples of Our America (ALBA) have been very clear in their statement and what is expected is to continue promoting Cuban attendance at the summit, he added.

articles.title: Brazil Criticizes Chevron for Ignoring Risk of Oil Spill
articles.content:
Brazil Criticizes Chevron for Ignoring Risk of Oil Spill
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Brazil has criticized U.S. oil giant Chevron for ignoring the risk of oil spills in the Frade Field, off Brazil's southeastern coast.
					A report from Brazil's Federal Police said on Monday that Chevron and its partner Transocean had insisted on drilling in the field with a pressure that is much higher than the reservoir can bear, ignoring the recommendations in geologic studies.
					
					Brazil's federal prosecutor's office has decided to charge 17 Chevron and Transocean executives for the oil spill, seizing their passports to stop them from trying to leave the country.

articles.title: Sri Lanka Stages Protest against West Backed Human Rights Resolution
articles.content:
Sri Lanka Stages Protest against West Backed Human Rights Resolution
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- More than 2 000 protesters marched towards the British High Commission in the Sri Lankan capital Colombo on Tuesday condemning the Western countries backed resolution scheduled to be taken up at this week's UN Human Rights Council sessions in Geneva. 
					Pro-government protesters marched up to the British High Commission and urged its former colonial ruler not to support the proposed resolution demanding to probe alleged war crimes and human rights violations.

articles.title: U.S. Military Racket against DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Military Racket against DPRK Flayed
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the AP revealed that U-2 of the U.S. forces makes reconnaissance flight over the DPRK every day after taking off from the U.S air base in Osan located not far from the Military Demarcation Line. 
					A U.S. military official said that the high-altitude reconnaissance plane based in south Korea plays the role of eye and ear that always watch the inside of north Korea, adding the plane is closely monitoring the moves of the north army.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This clearly proves that the U.S. warmongers consider a war against the DPRK as something in sight.
					
					The U.S. imperialists attach importance to the Korean Peninsula as they are working hard to carry out their Asia-Pacific strategy for aggression. They seek to execute their strategy for world domination with the Peninsula as a base.
					
					To this end, they are staging joint military drills under various codenames together with Japan and the south Korean puppet forces while massively reinforcing the aggression armed forces in and around south Korea.
					
					It is military common sense that espionage activities precede a war. Intensified espionage activities against the DPRK prove that a war by the U.S. is becoming a reality, not just a rumor.
					
					The U.S. is speaking of bettering relations with the DPRK in public. At the U.S.-DPRK dialogue, too, it said it does not pursue hostile policy toward the DPRK. But its deeds do not match its words.
					
					Its continued espionage acts and war drills are dangerous ones that pose a military threat to the DPRK and push the situation to an extreme phase. Action causes reaction.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to know well about its rival and behave with discretion.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Fighter Bomber Crashes
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Fighter Bomber Crashes
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A F-16 fighter bomber belonging to the U.S. 7th Air Force in south Korea crashed into a field on Wednesday during the war exercises against the DPRK, according to CBS of south Korea. 
					The plane that took off from the Osan U.S. Air Force base exploded in the air and crashed into the paddy-field in Hwayang-myon of Sochon County, South Chungchong Province.

articles.title: U.S. Political Circle Plagued by Scandals
articles.content:
U.S. Political Circle Plagued by Scandals
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The political field of the U.S. is plagued by all sorts of scandals. 
					The corruptive nature of the U.S. political arena has been brought to light with the recent revelation of a series of scandals.
					
					Politicians who declared to run for presidency on Republican Party ticket this year have faced a flurry of censure as scandals about them broke out.
					
					Mitt Romney, billionaire ex-governor of Massachusetts State, had hard time finding a clumsy excuse to explain a tax rate granted to him to be lower than the middle class.
					
					During the election campaign he said he had no job, only to be booed. He often took up 10 000 U.S. dollar bet, becoming the laughing stock for paying no heed to the current economic depression.
					
					In an interview with CNN he said there is no need to worry about the beggary as the social "benefits" system is in place in the U.S. His attitude of turning away from the people suffering from extreme hardships of living touched off the anger of the public.
					
					Rick Perry, governor of Texas State, in a live broadcast on a national television let loose a rough remark describing the Turkish leaders as "Islamic terrorists". His remark touched off heated argument about his candidacy for president.
					
					As the Turkish Foreign Ministry condemned in a statement the U.S. Republican Presidential contender Rick Perry for his inappropriate remark, the U.S. issued the statement of the State Department which said the government never agreed with his remark.
					
					Congressman Ron Paul made remarks discriminating against the black and advocated racism auguring the approach of a racial war. He faced the strong social opposition.
					
					Herman Cain had to give up his candidacy as his sexual scandal was disclosed even though he had been leading in the supporting rate.
					
					Ex-speaker of the House of Representatives Newt Gingrich was also blamed for his stained private life.

articles.title: U.S. Speeds up Development of New Cyber Weapons
articles.content:
U.S. Speeds up Development of New Cyber Weapons
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Defense Department currently speeds up the developing of a new generation of cyber weapons able to disrupt the enemy's military networks, even when such networks are not connected to the Internet. 
					According to U.S. officials, the new cyber weapons have the potential to disable the components of an enemy's weapons system, the Washington Post said.

articles.title: Day of Pakistan Marked
articles.content:
Day of Pakistan Marked
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Pakistani Ambassador to DPRK Arif Mahmood on Friday hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on the Day of Pakistan.
					Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Song Gi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kil Chol Hyok, secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League who is chairman of the Korea-Pakistan Friendship Association, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Mun Jae Chol, deputy general director of the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs, officials concerned of the DPRK and diplomatic envoys of various countries here.
					
					Staff members of the Pakistan embassy here were present there.
					
					Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: MINREX se refiere a lanzamiento de satelite "Kwangmyongsong-3"
articles.content:
MINREX se refiere a lanzamiento de satelite "Kwangmyongsong-3"
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 23 la siguiente declaracion:
					Entraron en la etapa practica crucial los preparativos para lanzar con las fuerzas y tecnologias domesticas el "Kwangmyongsong-3", satelite de observacion de la Tierra.
					
					El presente lanzamiento de satelite practico es el regalo de nuestro pueblo, que entra en las puertas de la gran potencia prospera, dedicado al centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y deviene la labor para materializar el legado del Dirigente     Kim Jong Il.
					
					El lanzamiento y el manejo del satelite practico, imprescindible al desarrollo economico del pais, son la demanda legitima de la epoca de ciencias y tecnologias sofisticadas y constituyen la tendencia internacional.
					
					Para mostrar de modo transparente el caracter pacifico del lanzamiento de satelite cientifico-tecnico, la RPDC ha invitado a los especialistas de las prestigiosas instituciones de desarrollo espacial del mundo y las personalidades del circulo de prensa para que observen el proceso del lanzamiento.
					
					El lanzamiento de satelite practico constituye el ejercicio del derecho independiente y legitimo de acuerdo con las universales leyes internacionales sobre el uso pacifico del cosmos, incluido el tratado del espacio cosmico, que refleja la unanime voluntad de la sociedad internacional y esta por encima de la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Si el lanzamiento de nuestro satelite artificial no puede ser realizado por lo que aprovecha la tecnologia de misil balistico como el de largo alcance, la RPDC perdera para siempre el derecho a lanzar el satelite.
					
					Es una pauta de doble rasero el que si bien ellos mismos lanzan ordinariamente satelites artificiales, solo la RPDC no puede realizarlo. 
					
					No deben tratar en el concepto de confrontacion nuestro lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacifistas sino aceptarlo imparcial y serenamente, lo cual es prueba practica del compromiso oficial de que no tienen la voluntad hostil a la RPDC.
					
					El lanzamiento de tal satelite artificial no tiene que ver con el acuerdo del 29 de febrero entre la RPDC y EE.UU. La primera ya aclaro fehacientemente en las conversaciones de alto nivel de tres veces con el segundo que el lanzamiento de satelite artificial no se incluye en el lanzamiento de misiles de largo alcance.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC tendente a ejecutar sinceramente el acuerdo con EE.UU. 
					
					La RPDC ya invito la delegacion de la Agencia Internacional de Energia Atomica para discutir el procedimiento de afirmar el cese temporal de las actividades de enriquecimiento de uranio y realiza con sinceridad el entendimiento mutuo para la ejecucion del acuerdo con la parte estadounidense.
					
					En la actualidad EE.UU. cuestiona el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC, lo cual contraviene a la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre y al respeto de la soberania y el espiritu de igualdad del acuerdo RPDC-EE.UU. basado en dicho documento y crea el obstaculo a la ejecucion de dicho acuerdo.
					
					Si aparece el malsano intento de privar nuestro derecho independiente y legitimo e imponer la injusta pauta de doble rasero, la RPDC tomara inevitablemente las contramedidas.
					
					La RPDC no desea la repeticion de la confrontacion y la agravacion de la tension.
					
					Espera que nuestros esfuerzos sinceros por preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y realizar la desnuclearizacion a traves del dialogo y negociaciones gocen de la respuesta debida de las partes concernidas.

articles.title: Se mejorara ambiente de inversion en Corea, asegura Yun Yong Sok
articles.content:
Se mejorara ambiente de inversion en Corea, asegura Yun Yong Sok
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- "Se mejorara aun mas el ambiente de inversion en Corea y los inversionistas extranjeros tendran aqui buenas opciones"
					Dijo a la ACNC Yun Yong Sok (50 anos de edad), subdirector del Comite de Empresas Asociadas e Inversiones de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y continuo:
					
					La economia nacional se desarrolla dia tras dia y se levantan por doquier nuevas fabricas, empresas y centrales electricas.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC mantiene invariablemente la politica de desarrollar la cooperacion economica con otros paises consolidando la base de la economia nacional independiente.
					
					A finales del ano expirado, hemos enmendando y suplementado conforme a la realidad del pais en desarrollo y las costumbres internacionales las leyes de inversion, tales como la ley de inversion extranjera, la ley de empresa asociada y mixta la ley de impuestos para las empresas inversionistas extranjeras y extranjeros.
					
					Acordamos desarrollar y gestionar en conjunto con la parte china la zona economica y comercial de Rason y la zona economica de las islas Hwanggumphyong y Wihwa, adoptamos nuevamente la ley de la segunda zona y enmendamos en general la ley de la primera zona.
					
					El desarrollo y la gestion en conjunto de las mencionadas zonas son nueva forma de cooperacion sin precedentes en el mundo, pero este proyecto marcha sin complicaciones gracias a los esfuerzos de ambas partes.
					
					Se incrementa sin parar el numero de contratos de asociacion y colaboracion firmados con Corea a medida que se va mejorando en ella el ambiente general de inversion.
					
					En particular, crece la atencion a los grandes proyectos de inversion tales como los recursos de lantanidos abundantes en Corea, el ferrocarril, la carretera y las centrales electricas.
					
					El Comite de Empresas Asociadas e Inversiones prestara profunda atencion a proteger los intereses y facilitar el trabajo de los inversionistas extranjeros, y al mismo tiempo, seguira estrechando el intercambio y la cooperacion con los gobiernos, las entidades de promocion de inversiones y las empresas de los paises correspondientes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia peroratas conflictivas de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia peroratas conflictivas de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, el traidor Lee Myung Bak dijo que "tambien nosotros, encarados con el Norte, no estamos libres de la amenaza del terror nuclear" y la presente "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" desempenara un gran papel en ampliar el cimiento de apoyo de la sociedad internacional sobre la desnuclearizacion del Norte".
					Con esta palabra, el puso al desnudo su intencion de poner sobre el tapete de esta "cumbre" el "problema nuclear del Norte" para convertirla en una cita de colaboracion internacional a favor de la campana nuclear anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 23 y continua:
					
					Ahora los habitantes surcoreanos viven siempre con el temor e inquietud por la guerra nuclear debido al alboroto conflictivo con el Norte y a la provocacion de guerra de agresion  a la RPDC del "poder" de Lee.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos ya trazaron el peligroso plan de asestar el ataque nuclear preventivo junto con Estados Unidos contra la RPDC. Nadie sabe cuando estallaria la guerra nuclear. Precisamente esto constituye la amenaza del terror nuclear.
					
					La "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" es un lugar para abordar la seguridad de las materias y las instalaciones nucleares. Por lo tanto, el supuesto "problema nuclear" de la RPDC no es la agenda de la cumbre ni sera el objeto a discutirse.
					
					Tales palabras de Lee demuestran fehacientemente que su criterio sobre la "seguridad nuclear" no es la paz y la seguridad del mundo sino la realizacion de su ambicion conflictiva colmada hasta en su tuetano.
					
					Existe la palabra "la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana", pero nunca la "desnuclearizacion del Norte". El problema de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana debe ser solucionado a traves de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, razon por la cual no tiene ninguna relacion con el problema de seguridad nuclear.
					
					El traidor Lee debe poner fin a su absurdidad que provoca la condena y burla del interior y exterior del pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun vuelve a rechazar "cumbre de seguridad nuclear"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun vuelve a rechazar "cumbre de seguridad nuclear"
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Las autoridades conservadoras del Sur de Corea deben cesar de inmediato su campana anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con vistas a la guerra nuclear contra esta que lanzan aprovechando la "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" a celebrarse en Seul.
					Exigio asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este viernes y continuo:
					
					Los conservadores surcoreanos quieren justificar su campana nuclear anti-RPDC difundiendo ampliamente al interior y exterior el rumor de la "amenaza nuclear proveniente del Norte" con motivo de dicha reunion internacional.
					
					Ellos van a auspiciar esta farsa anti-RPDC librando demencialmente por otra parte los ejercicios de guerra nuclear a lo largo de su territorio convertido en el mayor arsenal nuclear del mundo.
					
					Ademas, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos toman medidas para reforzar la seguridad mintiendo que se preve la "provocacion" y la "infiltracion" de alguien durante la cumbre.
					
					Esto insinua que ellos pueden inventar algun caso drastico si se intensifica en el suelo surcoreano la lucha antigubernamental y sigue desfavorable la situacion de si mismos en las "elecciones de parlamentarios", para imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC y desatar la guerra contra esta tomando ese caso como pretexto.
					
					Hay que frustrar sin falta el complot anti-RPDC de los conservadores surcoreanos para la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y para la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Es absurdisimo que la cumbre de seguridad nuclear se abra en el Sur de Corea donde esta desplegado el mayor numero de artefactos nucleares en este mundo.
